Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and profitability. Given its value to you, we are confident it will be a worthwhile investment. We are offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic acumen. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will not only secure a valuable asset but also benefit from our unparalleled customer support and service. We look forward to discussing how this product can revolutionize your business. Kindly let us know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
